item.description:
This month we have another great WINGs program titled "Checklists, What? Why? How?". Our guest speaker is the fantastic Gene Benson (genebenson.com). It should be a big draw!

This presentation is intended to increase the pilot's awareness of how effective and efficient checklist usage can actually lower the pilot's workload and increase safety. Even the most basic airplane can be flown more safely by incorporating appropriate checklists. You will learn why checklists should be dynamic documents, always ready to be improved or expanded.

View the Program Flyer

This is another event that we would like you to please sign up on both the Meetup (HERE) and WINGs sites. After you RSVP here, sign at on WINGs at http://www.faasafety.gov/SPANS/event_details.aspx?eid=44332

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $30bucks a year?

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site
